name: Legend
overview: The action is non-stop, the villains gruesome, the weapons are wicked and the graphics are sensational. Travel back into a medieval time when your sword was the only law. Where the rich and powerful reigned over the land with an iron fist of terror. Only you can free the people of Sellech, and keep Clovis from resurrecting the evil power and curses of Beldor. Enter the Black Temple and battle through worlds of wizards and fire breathing dragons. Conquer the baddest boss monsters ever seen and fight your way through the uncharted world of Legend.
